org.jhove2.module.format
Interface FormatModule

All Superinterfaces:
Module, Parser, Reportable
All Known Implementing Classes:
ArcModule, BaseFormatModule, Bytestream, DirectoryModule, FileSetModule, GzipModule, ICCModule, SgmlModule, ShapefileModule, TiffModule, UTF8Module, WarcModule, WAVEModule, XmlModule, ZipModule
public interface FormatModule
extends Module, Parser

Interface for format Module that models a format or format family.

Author:
mstrong, slabrams, smorrissey
